name: dev.ohmyposh/validator
description: Validate oh-my-posh configurations and segment snippets against the official schema.

tools.name: validate_config
tools.description: Validate an oh-my-posh configuration against the schema. Supports JSON, YAML, and TOML formats.

content.description: The configuration content as a string (JSON, YAML, or TOML)

format.description: The format of the configuration (auto-detect if not specified)

tools.name: validate_segment
tools.description: Validate a segment snippet against the oh-my-posh schema. Useful for validating individual prompt segments before adding them to a configuration.

content.description: The segment content as a string (JSON, YAML, or TOML)

format.description: The format of the segment (auto-detect if not specified)
